```{mermaid}
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B[Calculate Walk Time]
    B --> C{Walk Time Conditions}
    C -->|walk_time_first == 993| D[final_walk_time = 0]
    C -->|walk_time_first == 999 or NA| E{Check Reasons}
    E -->|Reason 4 or 6| F[final_walk_time = 0]
    E -->|Else| G[final_walk_time = NA]
    C -->|Else| H{Check Aid}
    H -->|Aid == 1| I[final_walk_time = if_else(2.5 / min(walk_time_first, walk_time_second) >= 1, 1, 0)]
    H -->|Aid in (2, 3, 4, 97)| J[final_walk_time = 0]
    H -->|Else| K[final_walk_time = NA]

    A --> L[Calculate Balance Score]
    L --> M[Calculate Semi-Tandem Time]
    M --> N{Semi-Tandem Conditions}
    N -->|stand_test_semi_tandem == 993| O[final_semi_tandem_time = 0]
    N -->|stand_test_semi_tandem == 999 or NA| P{Check Reasons}
    P -->|Reason 4 or 6| Q[final_semi_tandem_time = 0]
    P -->|Else| R[final_semi_tandem_time = NA]
    N -->|stand_test_semi_tandem == 1| S[final_semi_tandem_time = 1]
    N -->|stand_test_semi_tandem == 5| T[final_semi_tandem_time = 0]
    N -->|Else| U[final_semi_tandem_time = NA]

    L --> V[Calculate Tandem Time]
    V --> W{Tandem Conditions}
    W -->|stand_test_tandem == 993| X[final_tandem_time = 0]
    W -->|stand_test_tandem == 999 or NA| Y{Check Reasons}
    Y -->|Reason 4 or 6| Z[final_tandem_time = 0]
    Y -->|Else| AA[final_tandem_time = NA]
    W -->|stand_test_tandem == 1| AB[final_tandem_time = 1]
    W -->|stand_test_tandem == 5| AC[final_tandem_time = if_else(stand_test_tandem_time >= 10, 1, 0)]
    W -->|Else| AD[final_tandem_time = NA]

    L --> AE[Calculate Feet Together Time]
    AE --> AF{Feet Together Conditions}
    AF -->|stand_test_feet_together == 993| AG[final_feet_together_time = 0]
    AF -->|stand_test_feet_together == 999 or NA| AH{Check Reasons}
    AH -->|Reason 4 or 6| AI[final_feet_together_time = 0]
    AH -->|Else| AJ[final_feet_together_time = NA]
    AF -->|stand_test_feet_together == 1| AK[final_feet_together_time = 1]
    AF -->|stand_test_feet_together == 5| AL[final_feet_together_time = 0]
    AF -->|Else| AM[final_feet_together_time = NA]

    L --> AN[Calculate Final Balance Score]
    AN --> AO{Balance Score Conditions}
    AO -->|2 or more tests == 1| AP[final_balance_score = 1]
    AO -->|2 or more tests NA| AQ[final_balance_score = NA]
    AO -->|1 test NA, 1 test == 1, 1 test == 0| AR[final_balance_score = NA]
    AO -->|Else| AS[final_balance_score = 0]
    AN --> AT{Balance Test Affected}
    AT -->|balance_test_affected == 1| AU[final_balance_score = 0]
    AT -->|Else| AV[final_balance_score = final_balance_score]

    A --> AW[Calculate Sit-Stand Time]
    AW --> AX{Sit-Stand Conditions}
    AX -->|sit_stand_test_completed == 993| AY[final_sit_stand_time = 0]
    AX -->|sit_stand_test_completed == 999 or NA| AZ{Check Reasons}
    AZ -->|Reason 4 or 6| BA[final_sit_stand_time = 0]
    AZ -->|Else| BB[final_sit_stand_time = NA]
    AX -->|sit_stand_test_completed == 1| BC{Check Arm Use}
    BC -->|sit_stand_test_arm_use == 1| BD[final_sit_stand_time = 0]
    BC -->|sit_stand_test_arm_use == 5| BE{Check Time}
    BE -->|sit_stand_test_time <= 12| BF[final_sit_stand_time = 1]
    BE -->|sit_stand_test_time > 12| BG[final_sit_stand_time = 0]
    BE -->|Else| BH[final_sit_stand_time = NA]
    AX -->|sit_stand_test_completed == 5| BI[final_sit_stand_time = 0]
    AX -->|Else| BJ[final_sit_stand_time = NA]

    A --> BK[Calculate Final Physical Score]
    BK --> BL[final_physical_score = final_walk_time + final_balance_score + final_sit_stand_time]
    BL --> BM[Export Physical Dimension Data]
    BM --> BN[End]
```
